channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Victoria Road, 8th February
item.description:
Graffiti on the side of house. It is being added to slowly and has now started to appear on the front of the house. As it has not been removed at the outset, it is now encouraging other vandals to add to it

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Salusbury Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous missing yellow lid on pavement, tree instead, 8th February
item.description:
There used to be a yellow lid covering the sewer. Someone's stolen it a left an old Xmas tree instead. This is dangerous for pedestrians!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Neckinger, Old Kent Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.category: Fly-tip Medium - Up to medium size van load

item.title: Bin liner full of shattered glass, 8th February
item.description:

item.title: Bus stop K Lockmead Road towards Blackheath : damaged timetable panel and missing timetables, 8th February
item.description:
Bus stop K Lockmead Road towards Blackheath : damaged timetable panel and missing timetables See photos attached. One panel has lost its cover door and backplate hinges broken. In good panel only route 54 displayed. Needs repair to panel and supply of timetables for routes 89 108 N89 Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11-29, Belmont Hill, Blackheath, Lewisham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Black bin bag dumped next to bin., 8th February
item.description:
